attributes.review:

attributes.review: this app is not good. there is so much misinformation. as well as it completely made my phone crash! i just got a new phone and it took hours to download then when it did it made my phone glitch until i finally had to delete it! do not recommend! i am highly disappointed! ☹️😣😢

attributes.review: So I herd about the app and was so exited to get it so I can see about all this but when I got it it was not what I expected soo I will let you see for yourself
attributes.title: The worst

attributes.review: Do not get this app it might crash your phone. I’m not saying this as a “gen z prank on trump” but this app is genuinely trash. I would give it a 0 star rating but I can’t. So use with caution please.
attributes.title: ‼️⚠️WARNING ⚠️‼️

attributes.review: I downloaded this app being a huge rapist and racist fan and after I downloaded it my phone got a virus (China virus ™️ Donald trump 🇺🇸)!!!! But sadly, this app isn’t racist and supportive enough!!!! So upset. No longer a trump lover!!
attributes.title: AWFUL!!!

attributes.review: Not helpful, hard to navigate, and spreads incorrect information. Apple should delete this app ASAP.
